body:
I know how to take a screenshot using F3.
But how do you actually view it?
I know one way, but it is kinda complicated so i want to know more from you guys,
Thanks
body_tagged:
I know how to take a screenshot using F3.
But how do you actually view it?
I know one way, but it is kinda complicated so i want to know more from you guys,
Thanks
title: Screenshot viewing

replies.body:
Go to minecraft from application support using a Mac and select screenshots.

on a PC select .minecraft after searching for %appdata% and then select screenshots
replies.body_tagged:
Go to minecraft from application support using a Mac and select screenshots.

on a PC select .minecraft after searching for %appdata% and then select screenshots

replies.body: When you take a screenshot it will show up in chat hold ctrl and click on it.
replies.body_tagged: When you take a screenshot it will show up in chat hold ctrl and click on it.

replies.body:
I don't get what you mean,,
more specfic please?
replies.body_tagged:
I don't get what you mean,,
more specfic please?

replies.body: well in your computer file search thing look up %appdata% then go to .minecraft Then the saves file in .minecraft Then keep going to recent places and go to the .minecraft from there. P.S. It's F2 to take a screenie not F3 :P
replies.body_tagged: well in your computer file search thing look up %appdata% then go to .minecraft Then the saves file in .minecraft Then keep going to recent places and go to the .minecraft from there. P.S. It's F2 to take a screenie not F3 :P

replies.body: Just type screenshots in the search thing xD
